name: aedg_k12_interior_lighting

arguments.name: material_cost_ip
arguments.display_name: Material and Installation Costs for Lights per Floor Area

modeler_description_xml: Electric Equipment in un-recognized spaces will be left alone. This measure will attempt to retain schedules from the initial model. If the initial model contained multiple lights associated with multiple schedules, then one of those schedules will be picked for the new lights.
description_xml: This measure removes all existing electric equipment objects from spaces recognized as primary or secondary school space types, with the exception of the kitchen which has a dedicated measure that should be used. New equipment will be added based on the 50% K12 AEDG recommendations.
